job description:
LockerDomes native ad platform optimizes ROI in real time. Learn more at lockerdome.com.

As a Data Analyst on the Data & Analytics team, you will serve as the primary decision maker for advertiser and publisher accounts. Leveraging LockerDome's homegrown analytics tooling and optimization techniques, you will make daily optimizations to ensure we beat client expectations.

Your skills should include:
  • 1-5 years experience in a data analyst role
  • Degree in a business, scientific or quantitative field
  • Strong statistical intuition and command of relevant analytical approaches
  • Ability to explain your findings in a concise, actionable manner
  • Ability to learn new skills and information sets quickly
  • Deep knowledge of performance-based and direct response marketing
  • Deep knowledge of the native advertising and content marketing landscape
  • Deep knowledge of the digital media landscape
